sourcesContent:
<template>
    <v-text-field prepend-icon="search" :label="configuration.hintText" v-model="searchValue" @keyup.enter.native="search"/>
</template>
<script>
    export default {
        name    : 'SimpleTableFilterTextFilter',
        data() {
            return {
                searchValue: ''
            }
        },
        computed: {
            configuration() {
                let defaults = {
                    hintText: 'Search'
                };
                try {
                    defaults = Object.assign(defaults, this.controller.configuration.filter[this.code]);
                } catch (e) {
                    console.warn(`Unable to get configuration for filter ${this.code}`);
                }
                return defaults;
            }
        },
        props   : {
            /**
             * @type SimpleTableController
             */
            controller: { //TODO
                type   : Object,
                default: () => null
            },
            code      : {
                type   : String,
                default: ''
            }
        },
        methods : {
            search() {
                /** @type SimpleTableController */
                this.controller.loadData()
            }
        },
        watch   : {
            searchValue(newValue) {
                this.controller.setFilterValue(this.code, newValue);
            }
        }
    }
</script>
<style scoped>
</style>
